meta.title: BPO & Back Office Outsourcing Services | Outsourcing Group
meta.description: Professional BPO services: Contact Center, Digital Back Office, Data Management and Training. Outsource business processes and reduce costs.

hero.description1: Digital transformation requires structured, reliable, and scalable internal processes.
hero.description2: To support the company in managing data, documents, and operational activities, specific skills and dedicated resources are needed.
hero.description3: We integrate operational, technical, and analytical expertise.

assistenza-dedicata.name: Dedicated User Support
assistenza-dedicata.serviceDescription: We support your users with activations, configurations, and the use of digital services.
assistenza-dedicata.shortDescription: We support your users with activations, configurations, and the use of digital services.
assistenza-dedicata.detailDescription: We support your users with activations, configurations, and the daily use of digital services. Our team handles every request with competence and care, providing clear, timely, and personalized assistance. We guide users through the entire operational journey, from understanding the service to resolving any difficulties, ensuring a smooth and uninterrupted experience.
assistenza-dedicata.functionalitySubtitle: Every request is handled by a dedicated operator, trained on the client's services, following clear and measurable procedures.

item1.title: Understanding the Digital Service
item1.description: We help the user clearly understand what they are purchasing, what features are available, and how to access them.

item2.title: Guided Activations and Configurations
item2.description: We support users with initial activations, customized configurations, and technical settings, including step-by-step guidance.

item3.title: Technical-Operational Support
item3.description: We manage requests and technical issues related to the use of digital services, providing immediate solutions.

item4.title: Correct and Secure Usage
item4.description: We guide users in the compliant use of digital tools, reducing errors and improper behavior.

item5.title: Difficulty Resolution
item5.description: We intervene to unblock critical situations, guiding the user to resolution and ensuring service continuity.

item1.title: Always Operational Digital Services
item1.description: Save on salaries, benefits, and training with a team that is already prepared and certified.

item2.title: No Burden on Internal Departments
item2.description: We manage daily support, peak periods, and activations without interrupting your team.

assistenza-dedicata.detailedContentTitle: Support that simplifies the use of digital services

detailedContent.p1: With our dedicated support service, your users receive direct and personalized assistance to understand, configure, and correctly use the digital tools provided by your company. We handle activations, access issues, operational difficulties, technical problems, and any daily need that may hinder productivity.
detailedContent.p2: The company retains full control and governance of the digital service, while we manage all day-to-day operations. This allows internal departments - such as IT, HR, Compliance, or Digital Office - to focus on strategic activities without having to absorb continuous requests from users.
detailedContent.p3: The result is a digital service that is always operational, compliant with corporate policies, and correctly used by users, with support also available in English when needed.

contact-center.name: Contact Center
contact-center.serviceDescription: We manage all incoming customer communications with structured multichannel support.
contact-center.shortDescription: We manage all incoming customer communications with structured multichannel support.
contact-center.detailDescription: Structured multichannel assistance to manage every customer request clearly, quickly, and professionally. Every contact is tracked and managed to ensure maximum satisfaction.
contact-center.functionalitySubtitle: Every project starts with an analysis of the client's needs. We define workflows, train the team, and activate the necessary channels.

item1.title: Unified Multichannel Platform
item1.description: We manage all communications in a single console: phone, email, chat, tickets, and social media.

item2.title: Complete Traceability
item2.description: Every interaction is recorded and monitored, ensuring visibility on response times, outcomes, and volumes.

item3.title: Guaranteed SLAs
item3.description: We respect defined response times, with periodic reports on operational performance.

item4.title: Integrated Flow
item4.description: Entry occurs at the Contact Center and, if necessary, the request is directed to the client's departments for completion.

item5.title: Trained Operators
item5.description: Every operator is trained on the client's services to ensure competent and consistent responses.

advantages.item1: Single clear and professional point of contact
advantages.item6: Reduced internal workload for the business team

contact-center.detailedContentTitle: An integrated, fluid, and always-controlled customer service

detailedContent.p1: We manage all incoming customer communications through a multichannel model that includes phone, email, chat, social media, tickets, and digital platforms. Every request is handled with fast, consistent, and always traceable responses.
detailedContent.p2: Our Contact Center is the entry point for all communications: from here, requests are directed to Customer Care, which manages the relationship, and to Customer Service, which handles operational solutions.
detailedContent.p3: The full integration between Contact Center, Customer Care, and Customer Service ensures a seamless experience, uniform and of high quality, providing your users with a truly excellent Customer Experience.

outsourcing-back-office-digitale.name: Digital Back Office
outsourcing-back-office-digitale.serviceDescription: We provide a structured Digital Back Office service to manage operational activities related to digital services.
outsourcing-back-office-digitale.shortDescription: We provide a structured Digital Back Office service to manage operational activities related to digital services.
outsourcing-back-office-digitale.detailDescription: We support your digital processes through structured operational services, managed by qualified teams with compliant procedures. Every activity is tracked, verified, and completed according to defined SLAs.
outsourcing-back-office-digitale.functionalitySubtitle: The Outsourcing Group team manages the operational phases of digital services, from document verification to activation and delivery.

functionality.item1: Document verifications for user onboarding and service activation.
functionality.item2: Identity checks through digital systems and compliant procedures.
functionality.item3: Requirement validation (e.g., technical, regulatory, or contractual requirements).
functionality.item4: Customized configurations of accounts, profiles, and settings.
functionality.item5: On-demand activations with procedures defined by SLAs.
functionality.item6: Service delivery with end-to-end case management.
functionality.item8: Escalations to technical or advanced support departments when needed.

outsourcing-back-office-digitale.advantagesTitle: Digital Back Office is ideal for companies that:

advantages.item3: Must ensure quality and compliance in processes
advantages.item4: Want to lighten the internal operational load
advantages.item5: Operate in regulated sectors or high-volume environments

outsourcing-back-office-digitale.detailedContentTitle: Operational support that simplifies digital service management

detailedContent.p1: In the Digital Back Office, every phase must be managed with order and continuity: document verifications, identity checks, requirement validation, and activations require clear procedures and constant supervision.
detailedContent.p2: That is why we organize all activities into structured workflows, with complete traceability and processing times defined by agreed SLAs.
detailedContent.p3: We handle operations that cannot be fully automated, ensuring precision and consistency, even with high volumes or sensitive cases.
detailedContent.p4: The result is smoother management, fewer error risks, and an internal team that can focus on strategic activities.

gestione-anagrafiche-clienti-outsourcing.shortDescription: We manage the creation and alignment of client data in your business systems.
gestione-anagrafiche-clienti-outsourcing.detailDescription: We organize and manage all operational activities related to client data: from record creation to update management, with complete traceability and regulatory compliance.

item1.title: Standardized Procedures
item1.description: Every activity follows documented, verifiable, and replicable procedures to ensure quality and consistency.

item2.title: Complete Traceability

item3.title: Integration with Your Systems
item3.description: We work directly on CRM, management systems, and business databases without interrupting workflows.

item4.title: Qualified Supervision
item4.description: Operators trained on regulations and procedures specific to the client's sector.

item5.title: Continuous Quality Controls
item5.description: We perform constant checks on data and processes to intercept and correct errors before they have an impact.

advantages.item1: Elimination of registry and administrative errors
advantages.item2: Drastic reduction in internal management times
advantages.item4: Better experience for the end customer
advantages.item5: Control of financial flows and administrative processes
advantages.item7: Immediate scalability in case of volume increase

gestione-anagrafiche-clienti-outsourcing.detailedContentTitle: An administrative cycle always under control

detailedContent.p1: We manage all operational, administrative, and registry activities related to clients who use your company's digital services. From creating client codes to aligning records, from collections to refunds and invoice verification, every phase of the client lifecycle is managed precisely and consistently.
detailedContent.p2: This service is particularly suited to organizations managing recurring digital services, SaaS platforms, large registry databases, or processes with frequent activations and terminations. Multi-step administrative workflows and high-volume billing activities also find structured and reliable support.
detailedContent.p3: The result is an orderly, up-to-date administrative system that is fully traceable, eliminating errors and ensuring operational continuity. The company can thus focus on higher-value activities, delegating to us the precise and professional management of the entire administrative cycle.

data-management.name: Data Management
data-management.serviceDescription: Organized and secure management of business data, according to cybersecurity and compliance criteria.
data-management.shortDescription: Organized and secure management of business data, according to cybersecurity and compliance criteria.
data-management.detailDescription: We manage your data securely, organized, and compliant. From archiving to protection, from data quality to integration with business systems.
data-management.functionalitySubtitle: Every Data Management activity is managed with a clear, verifiable, and compliant operational model.

functionality.item1: We organize data in an orderly, structured, and easily accessible manner.
functionality.item2: We apply cybersecurity criteria to protect data from unauthorized access.
functionality.item3: We manage automatic backups and redundant copies to prevent any loss.
functionality.item4: We define roles and permissions, tracking every access and modification to data.
functionality.item5: We integrate data with CRM, ERP, management systems, and client platforms.
functionality.item6: We verify data quality, correcting inconsistencies and duplicates.

advantages.item1: We apply advanced cybersecurity standards to protect information.
advantages.item2: We keep data structured, aligned, and easily accessible.
advantages.item3: Constant backups and redundant systems to ensure operational continuity.
advantages.item4: Data always ready and available for analysis, reporting, and decision-making processes.
advantages.item5: Recovery procedures and continuous monitoring to prevent interruptions.
advantages.item6: We manage data in compliance with current regulations (GDPR, Data Act, etc.).
advantages.item7: We integrate into your digital systems without operational interruptions.

data-management.detailedContentTitle: A secure, organized, and always available data system

detailedContent.p1: Data Management has become a strategic element for any organization that wants to operate with continuity, security, and scalability. With our service, we structure, protect, and make all business data accessible, integrating them into digital processes and ensuring their availability at all times.
detailedContent.p2: We manage the entire data lifecycle by applying advanced cybersecurity and governance criteria. We organize information in an orderly and traceable manner, so systems work better and staff can rely on reliable and up-to-date databases.
detailedContent.p3: The result is a modern and resilient data infrastructure, capable of supporting digital projects, automation, and artificial intelligence initiatives. A secure, scalable environment designed to accompany the company's growth over time.

training-aziendali.name: Corporate Training
training-aziendali.serviceDescription: We offer corporate training for groups of end users on complex digital services.
training-aziendali.shortDescription: We offer corporate training for groups of end users on complex digital services.
training-aziendali.detailDescription: We design and deliver training activities dedicated to groups of employees who need to use complex digital services. Each session is designed to transfer practical and operational skills.
training-aziendali.functionalitySubtitle: Corporate training sessions are designed for groups of users who need to understand and use a specific digital service.

functionality.item1: We explain all features of the digital service in a clear and practical way.
functionality.item2: We answer participants' questions in real time.
functionality.item3: We demonstrate operational flows, from login to daily use.
functionality.item4: We guide employees in the correct, secure, and compliant use of the tool.
functionality.item5: We also cover parts of the service that not everyone will use, but that are useful to know.
functionality.item6: We can dedicate multiple days or sessions to specific modules based on needs.

item1.title: Customized
item1.description: Built to measure based on business needs, with focus on critical areas and internal operational flows.

item2.title: Standard
item2.description: Designed to provide a complete overview of the digital service, useful for onboarding and updates.

training-aziendali.detailedContentTitle: Corporate training to improve skills and processes

detailedContent.p1: We offer corporate training for groups of end users on the use of the client company's digital services. Training sessions can be modular, multi-session, customized, or standard.
detailedContent.p2: They cover all features of the service, including those not used by all roles, and provide operational instructions, best practices, security procedures, and direct support to participants.
detailedContent.p3: The goal is to ensure that the company has competent, autonomous employees ready to use the digital service correctly, improving productivity, operational continuity, and security.
